bool kmaOrange::Synonym::hasMoreLong ( void   )  [inline, virtual]

This function returns the variable hasMoreLongSynonym.

Date:
2008-11-03
Author:
YoungMin Ahn
Returns:
a boolean.
true - there are synonym entries that contain more than one entry and are longer than an entry.
false - there are not synonym entries that contain more than one entry and are longer than an entry.
